steps.description: Talk to Skuerto and accept Wand over Fist
Click the Shards of Myzrael and accept The Princess Trapped
Mine the Lesser Bloodstone Deposits. Loot it for Lesser Bloodstone Ore

tips.text: These are found inside of the Cave

steps.description: Kill Drywhisker Kobolds, Drywhisker Diggers and Drywhisker Surveyors. Loot them for their Motes

tips.text: The quest turn in for this is inside the Cave. Clear your way to the back while completing it

steps.description: Click the Iridescent Shards at the back of the Cave, turn in The Princess Trapped, and accept Stones of Binding
Open the Stone of East Binding. Loot it for the Cresting Key
Kill Cresting Exiles. Loot them for their Cresting Charms
Talk to Quae and accept Hints of a New Plague?
Kill the Forsaken Courier. Loot her for her Sealed Folder

tips.text: The Forsaken Courier patrols the road between Tarren Mill and Go'Shek Farm
Cast Eagle Eye to try and find the Forsaken Courier
If you can't see them in Hillsbrad, look for them in Arathi after. Her patrol route is marked on your map in Hillsbrad and Arathi

steps.description: Talk to Quae and turn in Hints of a New Plague?
Talk to Quae and Kinelory, turn in Hints of a New Plague?, and accept Hints of a New Plague?

tips.text: Someone may be doing the Kinelory escort if she isn't there. Wait until she returns

steps.description: Escort Kinelory through Go'Shek Farm
Talk to Quae, turn in Hints of a New Plague?, and accept Hints of a New Plague?
Enter the Bolderfist Hall Cave
Kill Kor'gresh Coldrage. Loot him for Trelane's Wand
Perform a Logout skip on the banner next to Kor'gresh Coldrage to teleport closer to Refuge Point. If you are unable to do this just run out normally

tips.text: Click here for video reference

steps.description: Talk to Skuerto and turn in Wand over Fist
Talk to Skuerto and accept Trelane's Defenses
Talk to Cedrik Prose and fly to Southshore
If you ever see a Shadowy Assassin in Southshore, kill them. Loot them for the Assassin's Contract. Use the Assassin's Contract to start the quest.

tips.text: The Shadowy Assassin attack on Southshore is a random event
Skip this step if you don't see the event

steps.description: Talk to Innkeeper Anderson and set your Hearthstone to Southshore
Talk to Raleigh the Devout up stairs and turn in Down the Scarlet Path
Talk to Raleigh the Devout up stairs and accept In the Name of the Light

quests.name: In the Name of the Light

steps.description: Talk to Magistrate Henry Maleb and turn in Assassin's Contract
Talk to Phin Odelic and turn in Hints of a New Plague?
Talk to Magistrate Henry Maleb and accept Baron's Demise
Talk to Magistrate Henry Maleb, turn in Further Mysteries, accept Dark Council and Noble Deaths
Talk to Marshal Redpath and accept Crushridge Warmongers
Talk to Loremaster Dibbs and turn in Southshore
Talk to Loremaster Dibbs and accept Preserving Knowledge
Talk to Archmage Ansirem Runeweaver, turn in Magical Analysis, and accept Ansirem's Key
Grind Crushridge Ogres and Crushridge Brutes while looking for a group for Scarlet Monastery
Enter Scarlet Monastery. Start with Library so you can loot the The Scarlet Key at the end
Loot the Mythology of the Titans

tips.text: This can spawn randomly on the ground or in bookshelves throughout the Library wing

steps.description: Kill Houndmaster Loksey, Herod, High Inquisitor Whitemane and Scarlet Commander Mograine

tips.text: Houndmaster Loksey is located in the Library
Herod is located in the Armory
High Inquisitor Whitemane and Scarlet Commander Mograine are located in the Cathedral

quests.name: In the Name of the Light

steps.description: Hearth to Southshore. Buy food/water if needed
Hearth to Southshore. Buy food if needed
Talk to Raleigh the Devout up stairs and turn in In the Name of the Light

quests.name: In the Name of the Light

steps.description: Travel to the Ruins of Alterac. This location will also serve as your exit route, should you need it
Kill Crushridge Warmongers

tips.text: Crushridge Warmongers call for help at 25% HP

steps.description: Kill Grel'borg the Miser. Loot him for the Perenolde Tiara

tips.text: Grel'borg the Miser patrols the Ruins of Alterac. He is a level 39 Elite and easy to kill so long as you don't agro additional mobs. His patrol route is marked on your map

steps.description: Enter the Town Hall. Open the Weathered Bookcase. Loot it for the Worn Leather Book

tips.text: You may kill Muckrake or just CC him, loot and then run away

steps.description: Kill Crushridge Warmongers

tips.text: Crushridge Warmongers call for help at 25% HP

steps.description: Travel to Dandred's Fold. Be careful of fall damage if dropping down from the Ruins of Alterac
Travel to Dandred's Fold
Kill the Syndicate. Loot them for their Signet Rings

tips.text: Syndicate Assassins and Syndicate Spies will be in Stealth

steps.description: Kill Nagaz. Loot him for his Head
Open the Worn Wooden Chest. Loot it for the Ensorcelled Parchment. Use the Ensorcelled Parchment to start the quest
Kill Argus Shadow Mages
Kill Baron Vardus. Loot him for his Head

tips.text: Baron Vardus can be in the outside camps, as well as the basement Inn of Strahnbrad

steps.description: Kill Argus Shadow Mages

tips.text: You may find Argus Shadow Mages in Strahnbrad as well as The Uplands

steps.description: Kill the Syndicate. Loot them for their Signet Rings

tips.text: Syndicate Assassins and Syndicate Spies will be in Stealth

steps.description: Kill Crushridge Ogres and Crushridge Brutes. Loot them for their Tomes
Talk to Bibilfaz Featherwhistle and fly to Southshore
Talk to Marshal Redpath and turn in Crushridge Warmongers
Talk to Magistrate Henry Maleb, turn in Noble Deaths and Dark Council
Talk to Magistrate Henry Maleb and turn in Baron's Demise
Talk to Loremaster Dibbs, turn in Preserving Knowledge and The Ensorcelled Parchment, and accept Return to Milton and Stormpike's Deciphering
Talk to Loremaster Dibbs, turn in The Ensorcelled Parchment, and accept Return to Milton and Stormpike's Deciphering
Talk to Loremaster Dibbs, turn in The Ensorcelled Parchment, and accept Stormpike's Deciphering
Talk to Loremaster Dibbs, turn in The Ensorcelled Parchment, and accept Stormpike's Deciphering
Talk to Darla Harris and fly to Arathi Highlands
Kill Thundering Exiles. Loot them for their Thundering Charms
Open the Stone of Outer Binding. Loot it for the Thundering Key
Kill Thundering Exiles. Loot them for their Thundering Charms
Travel to the Circle of West Binding
Kill Burning Exiles. Loot them for their Burning Charms
Open the Stone of West Binding. Loot it for the Burning Key
Kill Burning Exiles. Loot them for their Burning Charms
Travel to Chillwind Point in Alterac Mountains
Click Bath'rah's Cauldron
Before Accepting The Summoning watch the video below on how to solo Cyclonian

tips.text: Click here for video reference

steps.description: Talk to Bath'rah the Windwatcher and turn in Cyclonian
Talk to Bath'rah the Windwatcher and accept The Summoning.

tips.text: Accepting this quest will summon Cyclonian. He hits fairly hard, but can be solo'd. Be sure to check the video for pointers on how to do so
Click here for video reference

steps.description: Follow Bath'rah the Windwatcher to where he will summon Cyclonian. Kill Cyclonian. Loot him for his Whirlwind Heart

tips.text: Cyclonian hits fairly hard, but can be solo'd. Be sure to check the video for pointers on how to do so
Click here for video reference

steps.description: Talk to Bath'rah the Windwatcher and turn in The Summoning
Talk to Bath'rah the Windwatcher and turn in Whirlwind Weapon

tips.text: The Whirlwind Axe is the best reward out of them all. However, if you do wish to choose a different weapon, it's only a small loss

steps.description: Travel to The Hinterlands
Travel to The Hinterlands
Talk to Falstad Wildhammer, turn in To The Hinterlands, and accept Gryphon Master Talonaxe
Talk to Guthrum Thunderfist and get The Hinterlands Flight Path
Talk to Gryphon Master Talonaxe, turn in Gryphon Master Talonaxe, and accept Rhapsody Shindigger
Talk to Rhapsody Shindigger, turn in Rhapsody Shindigger, and accept Rhapsody's Kalimdor Kocktail
Hearth to Southshore. Buy food/water if needed
Hearth to Southshore. Buy food if needed
Talk to Darla Harris and fly to Arathi Highlands
Talk to Captain Nials and accept Stromgarde Badges
Click the Wanted Board, accept Wanted! Marez Cowl and Wanted! Otto and Falconcrest
Click the Stone of Inner Binding and turn in Stones of Binding
Click the Stone of Inner Binding, turn in Stones of Binding, and accept Breaking the Keystone
Kill Syndicate Thieves, Syndicate Conjurors and Syndicate Prowlers. Loot them for their Badges
Kill Marez Cowl. Loot her for her Head

tips.text: Marez Cowl has 2 different spawn locations. One is on the high ground location, and the other is below behind the house. They are marked on your map
Cast Eagle Eye to try and find which location she is in

steps.description: Kill Otto and Lord Falconcrest. Loot them for their Heads
Kill Marez Cowl. Loot her for her Head

tips.text: Marez Cowl has 2 different spawn locations. One is on the high ground location, and the other is below behind the house. They are marked on your map
Cast Eagle Eye to try and find which location she is in

steps.description: Kill Syndicate Thieves, Syndicate Conjurors and Syndicate Prowlers. Loot them for their Badges
Kill Boulderfist Shamans. Loot them for the Azure Agate
Kill Fozruk. Loot him for the Rod of Order

tips.text: Focus on killing and interrupting the casts of Sleeby, Znort and Feeboz before killing Fozruk
Fozruk can be CC'd
Their patrol path is marked on your map
Cast Eagle Eye to try and find Fozruk
Click here for video reference
Click here for video reference

steps.description: Click on the Keystone and turn in Breaking the Keystone

tips.text: If you are still in a group, hand in this quest while with your party! Thenan, a level 42 Elite will spawn. You can either kill him or run away and reset him if you're solo

steps.description: Click on the Keystone and accept Myzrael's Allies
Talk to Captain Nials, turn in Stromgarde Badges, Wanted! Marez Cowl, and Wanted! Otto and Falconcrest
Talk to Captain Nials and turn in Wanted! Marez Cowl
Talk to Captain Nials and turn in Wanted! Otto and Falconcrest
Talk to Captain Nials and turn in Stromgarde Badges
Talk to Apprentice Kryten and turn in Trelane's Defenses
Talk to Apprentice Kryten and accept An Apprentice's Enchantment
Talk to Skuerto and turn in An Apprentice's Enchantment. Skip the follow up. It is way too dangerous in Hardcore

tips.text: Skip the follow up. It is way too dangerous in Hardcore

steps.description: Travel to Faldir's Cove
Talk to Lolo the Lookout and accept Land Ho!
Talk to Shakes O'Breen and turn in Land Ho!
Talk to First Mate Nilzlix and accept Deep Sea Salvage
Talk to Captain Steelgut and accept Drowned Sorrows
Talk to Professor Phizzlethorpe and accept Sunken Treasure. This will start an escort.

tips.text: This will start an escort. If Professor Phizzlethorpe is not there, someone may already be doing it. Wait for him to return

steps.description: Escort Professor Phizzlethorpe into the small Cave. Kill the Vengeful Surges that attack once inside. Follow Professor Phizzlethorpe back to the camp afterwards
Talk to Doctor Draxlegauge, turn in Sunken Treasure, and accept Sunken Treasure
Use your Elixir of Water Breathing if you have one.

tips.text: PAY CLOSE ATTENTION TO YOUR BREATH BAR IF YOU DO NOT HAVE ONE!

steps.description: Loot the Elven Gems on the sea floor. Equip your Goggles of Gem Hunting so the Elven Gems show up on your minimap

tips.text: Ensure you have buffed yourself with Unending Breath
Cast Aquatic Form once your Breath Bar gets low

steps.description: Kill Daggerspine Raiders and Daggerspine Sorceresses

tips.text: Be aware the Daggerspine Raiders will cast Net on you

steps.description: Loot Maiden's Folly Log on the 2nd floor of the ship. It is inside of the Cauldron
Loot Maiden's Folly Charts on the 2nd floor of the ship. It is on the Pillar
Swim to the other sunken ship
Loot the Spirit of Silverpine Charts on the 2nd floor of the ship. It is on top of the Crate next to the Cannon
Loot the Spirit of Silverpine Charts on the bottom of the ship. It is on the sea floor
Loot the Elven Gems on the sea floor. Equip your Goggles of Gem Hunting so the Elven Gems show up on your minimap

tips.text: Ensure you have buffed yourself with Unending Breath
Cast Aquatic Form once your Breath Bar gets low

steps.description: Kill Daggerspine Raiders and Daggerspine Sorceresses

tips.text: Be aware the Daggerspine Raiders will cast Net on you

steps.description: Loot the Elven Gems on the sea floor. Equip your Goggles of Gem Hunting so the Elven Gems show up on your minimap

tips.text: Ensure you have buffed yourself with Unending Breath
Cast Aquatic Form once your Breath Bar gets low

steps.description: Equip your normal Helmet
Talk to First Mate Nilzlix and turn in Deep Sea Salvage
Talk to Captain Steelgut and Doctor Draxlegauge, turn in Drowned Sorrows and Sunken Treasure, and accept Sunken Treasure
Talk to Shakes O'Breen, turn in Sunken Treasure, and accept Sunken Treasure
Logout on top of the rock in the cave where you escorted Professor Phizzlethorpe, then log back in

tips.text: Click here for video reference

steps.description: Talk to Cedrik Prose and fly to Ironforge
